name: Rattle Me Bones!
description:
Ahoy, matey! This be Rattle Me Bones!, a project made for the MSOE Game Development Club's 2022 Inktober Game Jam. It was created in a week under the theme "BONES". Note that this game uses peer-to-peer communication and does not function properly on public MSOE networks.

The great skeleton pirate legends gather at the tracks to decide who sails the fastest of them all...Gather your crew and prove that you're the sauciest scallywag to ever drift the seven seas!

Since the jam is a month long, I've been considering continuing to work on this same project and submitting an improved version at the end of the month. This may still happen, but it's more likely I'll just end up making a different game and updating this one much later. If that happens, I'll try to have a more polished post-jam version uploaded here eventually, so stay tuned for that if you find yourself in need of some more sophisticated bone-rattling.

Anyway, thanks for playing and all that.
